summary: Your Astro-Cinematic Character Map blends core identity (Sun), mood and instincts (Moon), on-screen vibe (Ascendant), and the setting where your story unfolds (Chart Ruler’s house).
ascendant: ASCENDANT — YOUR VIBE, AESTHETIC & OPENING-SCENE ENERGY → Your Ascendant sign sets the first impression, visual tone, and the way your character enters a scene.
chart_ruler:
CHART RULER — Who’s Directing the Scene
→ Your chart ruler is the ruling planet of your Ascendant sign. Its sign and house show how your storyline unfolds and who’s directing the vibe behind the scenes.
chart_ruler_house: CHART RULER IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOUR STORY UNFOLDS → The house shows the primary stage for your plot. Its sign sets the set design and mood of that stage.
houses_global_intro:
HOUSES IN THE SIGNS — SET DESIGN FOR YOUR COSMIC STAGE
The house shows where the story unfolds. But the sign on the cusp tells us with what style. Below, each house takes on a unique aesthetic depending on its sign — aka, the set design of your cosmic stage.
sun_sign: SUN SIGN — CORE ARCHETYPE → The Sun sign is the central character: your baseline motivation, creative will, and how you like to shine.
sun_house: SUN IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOUR LIGHT LANDS → The house shows the arena of life where your lead character takes center stage.
moon_sign: MOON SIGN — INNER WORLD & EMOTIONAL TEXTURE → The Moon sign colors your needs, comfort language, and the mood lighting of your character.
moon_house: MOON IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOU SEEK COMFORT → The house shows where your character self-soothes and reacts on instinct.
mercury_sign: MERCURY SIGN — DIALOGUE & THOUGHT STYLE → Mercury’s sign shapes your voice, timing, and how ideas cut on screen.
mercury_house: MERCURY IN THE HOUSES — WHERE THE CONVERSATION HAPPENS → The house points to the setting where messages, learning, and logistics matter most.
venus_sign: VENUS SIGN — TASTE, PLEASURE & CHEMISTRY → Venus’ sign curates your aesthetic, values, and on-screen attraction style.
venus_house: VENUS IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOU ATTRACT & ENJOY → The house shows the scenes where art, love, and harmony become plot points.
mars_sign: MARS SIGN — DRIVE, COURAGE & CONFLICT STYLE → Mars’ sign frames how you pursue goals, fight, and move the plot forward.
mars_house: MARS IN THE HOUSES — WHERE ACTION HAPPENS → The house reveals the battlegrounds and training montages of your story.
jupiter_sign: JUPITER SIGN — LUCK, GROWTH & BELIEF → Jupiter’s sign expands your horizons and frames your ‘why not?’ moments.
jupiter_house: JUPITER IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOU GROW → The house shows the domains that open doors, mentors, and opportunities.
saturn_sign: SATURN SIGN — STRUCTURE, MASTERY & EDITS → Saturn’s sign defines your discipline, boundaries, and the lessons that mature the character.
saturn_house: SATURN IN THE HOUSES — WHERE WORK GETS REAL → The house marks the long arc of effort, responsibility, and earned respect.
uranus_sign: URANUS SIGN — DISRUPTION & ORIGINALITY → Uranus’ sign brings plot twists, independence, and a signature weirdness.
uranus_house: URANUS IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOU BREAK THE SCRIPT → The house shows the set piece for sudden change and innovation.
neptune_sign: NEPTUNE SIGN — DREAM, MYTH & DISSOLVE → Neptune’s sign adds glamour, empathy, and fog — the montage between reality and fantasy.
neptune_house: NEPTUNE IN THE HOUSES — WHERE THINGS BLUR → The house shows the scenes of inspiration, projection, and surrender.
pluto_sign: PLUTO SIGN — POWER, SHADOW & TRANSFORMATION → Pluto’s sign reveals deep motives, obsessions, and rebirth arcs.
pluto_house: PLUTO IN THE HOUSES — WHERE YOU EVOLVE → The house marks the underworld journey that changes the character for good.
